channel.title: Butterbeer PK Server [Picture Heavy]
channel.description:
I don't feel like posting a lot, so there are a fewfeatures I haven't posted pics of.
[center][b]Butterbeer v1[/b][/center]
This is my first server project btw.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/29x6l1z.jpg[/img]
[img]http://508revolution.webs.com/cooking.gif[/img]
[url=http://508revolution.webs.com/DarkBow.gif]Dark Bow Special, skulling, wilderness levels. (Lags quite a bit. Using Deathmoon Client.)[/url]
[img]http://508revolution.webs.com/WoodCutting.gif[/img]
[url=http://508revolution.webs.com/Autocast.gif]Autocasting. (also lags quite a lot.)[/url]
[b]-Features-[/b]
[center] -Simple home with training space, alters and tiny skilling area.- -70% Crafting (Just spinning flax and basic making hides)- -99% Woodcutting (Pretty much everything works, you just need an axe equipped)- -99% Mining (Same as woodcutting)- -Pickup (You can't pickup shop items.)- -BASIC DRAGON CLAWS SPEC- -Full wilderness levels. KBD lair is a bit glitchy.- -Loads of PK teleports- -80% KBD. Doesn't breathe poison.- -Basic Anti-Syi- -Tons of commands- -70% prayer (no retribution or heart prayer, forget what its called and piety + chivalry.- -85% range ish?- -Full skulling- -80% Firemaking- -80% Agility- -AGS Special- -BGS Special- -DDS Special- -Mage bow special- -Dragon long special- -Whip special- -DFS special (Happens randomly)- -Jad switches attacks- -You need to kill Jad to get a fire cape- -Basic Vengance- -Recoil rings work, but a bit glitchily.- -and more that I can't think of ATM.-[/center]
Flame on, losers.

item.title: Butterbeer PK Server [Picture Heavy]
item.dc:creator: @ZYG ZYG
item.description:
@ZYG wrote:

I don’t feel like posting a lot, so there are a fewfeatures I haven’t posted pics of.

[center]Butterbeer v1[/center]

This is my first server project btw.

Dark Bow Special, skulling, wilderness levels. (Lags quite a bit. Using Deathmoon Client.)

Autocasting. (also lags quite a lot.)

-Features-

[center]
-Simple home with training space, alters and tiny skilling area.-
-70% Crafting (Just spinning flax and basic making hides)-
-99% Woodcutting (Pretty much everything works, you just need an axe equipped)-
-99% Mining (Same as woodcutting)-
-Pickup (You can’t pickup shop items.)-
-BASIC DRAGON CLAWS SPEC-
-Full wilderness levels. KBD lair is a bit glitchy.-
-Loads of PK teleports-
-80% KBD. Doesn’t breathe poison.-
-Basic Anti-Syi-
-Tons of commands-
-70% prayer (no retribution or heart prayer, forget what its called and piety + chivalry.-
-85% range ish?-
-Full skulling-
-80% Firemaking-
-80% Agility-
-AGS Special-
-BGS Special-
-DDS Special-
-Mage bow special-
-Dragon long special-
-Whip special-
-DFS special (Happens randomly)-
-Jad switches attacks-
-You need to kill Jad to get a fire cape-
-Basic Vengance-
-Recoil rings work, but a bit glitchily.-
-and more that I can’t think of ATM.-[/center]

Flame on, losers.

Read full topic
